newsitem.title: USA: Cognitronics says Q2 sales higher than Q2'96.
newsitem.headline: Cognitronics says Q2 sales higher than Q2'96.

text.p: Conitronics Corp said Thursday that it expects second quarter 1997 sales will increase substantially over 1996 second quarter sales of $5.1 million.
The company said domestic operations are seeing a strong demand for its McIAS 6xx series products, and its sales order backlog has increased to $5.2 million.

The company said the sales order backlog includes the recently announced volume orders from a nationwide, independent telecommunications company for the flagship McIAS 1623/IP voice processing system valued at almost $1 million, for delivery in 1997.
